definition: to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: She leafed through some old magazines while waiting for her husband.
sentences.chinese: 在等她的丈夫时，她翻阅了一些旧杂志。

sentences.english: Turn to Isaiah 26:3 and believe it today.
sentences.chinese: 翻阅以赛亚书二十六章3节，并立志信靠它。

sentences.english: This is a well- thumbed book.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本常被翻阅的书。

sentences.english: You can read a book anywhere, any time.
sentences.chinese: 但书，你可以随时随地的翻阅。

sentences.english: She took the novel down and busily thumbed it through.
sentences.chinese: 她把小说拿下来，匆匆地翻阅了一下。

sentences.english: Haywire pulls the sketchbook out from under the bunk and begins flipping through the pages.
sentences.chinese: Haywire从床铺下拿出了并翻阅一套素描本。

sentences.english: The passengers were leafing through magazines in the airport shop.
sentences.chinese: 这些旅客正在机场商店里翻阅杂志。

sentences.english: Looking through the Akashic records is like leafing through an infinite mental photo album.
sentences.chinese: 察看阿卡西记录就像翻阅一本无限的精神相册一样。

sentences.english: Page through several and find one that appeals to you.
sentences.chinese: 翻阅几页找到合适你的那一本。

sentences.english: Levitus thumbs through a stack of index cards sent along by the British Royal Navy.
sentences.chinese: 莱维图斯一直翻阅英国皇家海军送来的一叠叠卡片。

sentences.english: While Comrade Wang was idly turning over a magazine, the bell rang.
sentences.chinese: 当王同志正随便翻阅一本杂志时，铃声响了。

sentences.english: Teri rifles through her date book hoping to jar her memory.
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞翻阅她的日志簿，希望激起她的记忆。

sentences.english: The old book is gradually disintegrating with age.
sentences.chinese: 这本旧书因长年翻阅正在逐渐破损。

sentences.english: No one could read it before he had.
sentences.chinese: 在他没有看完之前任何人不得翻阅那些报纸。

sentences.english: She was thumbing through the magazine.
sentences.chinese: 她在迅速翻阅那本杂志。

definition: to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
